players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found out he's one of them."
Diana: "I don't think Bob is the mafioso, I think it's Charlie who was killed by him."
Bob: "I have an alibi for Night 1. I was in my hideout, far from the scene of the crime."
